attributes.action: Cap the value in which a Salesperson can sell an item for, in order to maximise there own personal profits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many salesmen can sell there companies product for any value. This means there is no limit as to what they can charge. The elderly in particular are targeted and are tricked into buying beds worth hundreds of pounds, for thousands of pounds instead. Why is this allowed. The government should enforce that these sales companies cap the value in which they can sell at.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
